title: 108_hr1382
content: EMTALA Regulatory Improvement Act of 2003 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish a procedure to notify hospitals and physicians when an investigation under the Emergency Medical Treatment and Labor Act (EMTALA) is closed. Directs the Secretary to establish a Technical Advisory Group to review issues related to EMTALA and its implementation.
